alert.note: Alert for Benton; Yakima (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 11:57PM PDT until July 07 at 12:30AM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM PDT FOR WEST CENTRAL BENTON AND SOUTHEASTERN YAKIMA COUNTIES... At 1156 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles northeast of Sunnyside, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sunnyside, Grandview, Toppenish, Granger, Zillah, Mabton, Satus and Buena. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
